title: Call me
lyrics:
Da nal buleowohago issneun geon
Nega yeppeoseoman-eun anya
Nan geuleolsulog deo nega joh-eun geonji
Eonjedeunji Call me
Amudo oji anhneun gos-e olla

Sueog gaeui byeol-eul du nun-e dam-a

Gajyeoganeun chueogdeul ap-euloneun myeoch beonjjeum

Neowa ileohge mandeul su iss-eulkka

Baesinhaneun il ttawin eobsdago bwa

Maebeon noligo iss-eo neol usgil teumman

Romantic comedy neoman nuleumyeon dwae Get ready

Somebody told me you should beware

Jeonbu heos-soli



Let me say oh nawa gat-eun mam-ilamyeon

Dan ilcholado neowa hamkke issneun sigan-igo sip-eo

Geu kkum-eul jikil su issdamyeon naleul balbgo nal-agado joh-a

I’ll do anything for ya



Come and enjoy your party

You’re the one and only

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

Come and enjoy your party

Da kkeutnal ttaekkaji

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



Ring ring ring eonjedeunji Call me (Brr brr)

Pil-yohamyeon neoleul wihaeseon I can do anything anytime anywhere (Yeah)

Love affair love affair love affair (I’m in love)

Neoui oemoppunman anila ne seong-gyeogdo neomu aleumdawo

Every girl be sour but nuga mwola haedo jeonhyeo sang-gwan-eobs-eo (Nope)

Girl of my dreams and the one I need geugeon balo You



Eonje eodideunji mudjido ttajijido malgo Call me

Neoege iss-eoseo mankeum-eun na Yes man mulbul galiji anh-euni

Oh I wanna be your BATMAN neol wihyeobhaneun godamsiui

Neoman-eul wihan Unsung hero salang-eul julge najocha nollal jeongdolo



Let me say oh nawa gat-eun mam-ilamyeon

Dan ilcholado neowa hamkke issneun sigan-igo sip-eo

Geu kkum-eul jikil su issdamyeon naleul balbgo nal-agado joh-a

I’ll do anything for ya



Come and enjoy your party

You’re the one and only

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

Come and enjoy your party

Da kkeutnal ttaekkaji

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh



Neon unmyeong-ilan geo midneunji moleujiman

But I’m so serious serious no

Deo teugbyeolhan salang eodi issdaneun geonji

Neoman-i nal Call me oh



Let me say oh nawa gat-eun mam-ilamyeon

Dan ilcholado neowa hamkke issneun sigan-igo sip-eo

Geu kkum-eul jikil su issdamyeon naleul balbgo nal-agado joh-a

I’ll do anything for ya



Come and enjoy your party

You’re the one and only

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

Come and enjoy your party

Da kkeutnal ttaekkaji

Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
